translation: The Raja of Jaswal rushed forward on the galloping horse.

gurmukhi: ਲਯੋ ਘੇਰ ਹੁਸੈਨੀ || ਹਨਿਯੋ ਸਾਂਗ ਪੈਨੀ ||੩੩||
transliteration: Layo Gher Housainoo|| Haniyo Saan Painoo||33||
translation: He surrounded Hussain and struck his sharp lance at him.33.

gurmukhi: ਤਿਨੂ ਬਾਣ ਬਾਹੇ || ਬਡੇ ਸੈਨ ਗਾਹੇ ||
transliteration: Tinoo Baan Baahe|| Bade Sain Gadhe||
translation: He (Hussaini) discharged arrow and destroyed much of the army.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਸੈ ਅੰਗਿ ਲਾਗਿਯੋ || ਤਿਸੈ ਪ੍ਰਾਣ ਤਯਾਗਯੋ ||੩੪||
transliteration: Jisai An(i) Laagiyo|| Tisai Praan Tyaagado||34||
translation: He, who is struck by the arrow on his chest, he breathes his last.34.

gurmukhi: ਜਬੈ ਘਾਵ ਲਾਗਯੋ || ਤਬੈ ਕੋਪ ਜਾਗਯੋ ||
transliteration: Jabai Ghaav Laagyo|| Tahai Kop Jaagyo||
translation: Whenever one is wounded, he gets highly infuriated.
Then, holding his bow, he kills the warriors with arrows. 35.

gurmukhi: ਚਹੂੰ ਓਰ ਢੂਕੇ || ਮੁਖੰ ਮਾਰ ਕੂਕੇ ||
translation: The warriors advance from all the four sides and shout “kill, kill”.

gurmukhi: ਨ੍ਰਿਭੈ ਸਸਤ੍ਰ ਬਾਹੈਂ || ਦੋੳੂ ਜੀਤ ਚਾਹੈਂ ||੩੬||
transliteration: Nribhai Sastra Baahain|| Dooo Jeet Chaahain||36||
translation: They strike their weapons fearlessly, both the sides wish for their victory.36.
The sons of Khans, in great ire and puffed up with great ego,

gurmukhi: ਮਹਾ ਬਾਣ ਬਰਖੇ || ਸਭੈ ਸੂਰ ਹਰਖੇ ||੩੭||
transliteration: Mahaa Haan Barkhe|| Sabhai Soor Harkhe||37||
translation: Shower the rain of arrows; all the warriors are filled with anger.37.

gurmukhi: ਕਰੈ ਬਾਣ ਅਰਚਾ || ਧਨੁਰ ਬੇਦ ਚਰਚਾ ||
transliteration: Darai Haan Archaa|| Dhanur Bed Charchaa||
translation: There is spattering of arrows (in worship) and the bows seem engaged in Vedic discussion.

gurmukhi: ਸੁ ਸਾਂਗੰ ਸਮ੍ਹਾਲੰ || ਕਰੈ ਤੳੁਨ ਠਾਮੰ ||੩੮||
transliteration: Su Saanadg Sadhaalan|| Darai Taoun Thaamannd||38||
translation: Wherever the warrior wants to strike the blow, he strikes it.38.

gurmukhi: ਬਲੀ ਬੀਰ ਰੁੱਝੇ || ਸਮੂਹ ਸਸਤ੍ਰ ਜੁੱਝੇ ||
transliteration: Badoo Boor Rujjhe|| Samoond Sastra Jujjhe||
translation: The brave fighters are busy in this task; they are engaged in war with all their wepons.
